title: All Kinds of Faces
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Haaah.... She’s so wonderful....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hey, Dia-san! Sorry to keep you waiting~. What are you looking at?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>No, it’s nothing, Nozomi-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Making a video out of Elicchi’s pictures?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Y-, y-, you saw!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I did♪ Mhmm, Elicchi does have an amazing aura when she’s performing. I can see why you fell for her.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>You also think so, Nozomi-san? Even though you’re in the same group?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah. I think everyone has a special charm to them when they’re performing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s right. Eli-san is lovely both in magazines and in real life, but she’s even more radiant on stage.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Would you like to see a picture of that radiant Elicchi dozing off?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh!? N-, no, that would be breaching her privacy....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I wanted to show you Elicchi when she’s relaxed too.... But if you say so, then maybe next time–<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Well, if you’re going to show them to me one day anyway, I might as well see them now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, which one would you like~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
